features.name: Rocket construction
features.comment: Basic rocket builder in debug mode

features.name: Maneuvering nodes
features.comment: Functional. Crude UI. Execution limited to one maneuvering node. (If multiple, none of them will execute)

features.name: Orbital elements readouts (apoapsis, periapsis, etc...)
features.comment: Functional. Crude UI. Some text overlapping. Modders working on this as well. [(Barney) KittenEngineerRedux](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/kitten-engineer-redux-ker.443/)

features.name: Automatic maneuvers (circularice, rendezvous, etc...)
features.comment: There is a modder working on this. "ModNameGoesHere" [(Barney) KittenEngineerRedux](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/kitten-engineer-redux-ker.443/)

features.name: Flight assistance
features.comment: Some modders working on a mod for this. [(Dejvid) Avionics](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/avionics.560/)

features.name: G-forces
features.comment: Some modders working on a mod for this. [(AMPW) G Effects](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/g-effects.635/)

features.name: Capsules
features.comment: Few capsules available, mainly the 3D models.

features.name: Probe cores
features.comment: Some modders are working on this [(Thoteus) Sputnik, Luna, and Vega](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/probe-parts-plus-features-3-probes-sputnik-luna-and-vega-also-restores-stock-apollo-csm-and-gemini-6a.433/)

features.name: Living spaces and habitats
features.comment: Some modders are working on a similar concept. [(Kepeca) ONeilCylinder](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/oneil-cylinder-mod.395/)

features.name: Fuel tanks
features.comment: Some basic tanks and 3D models are ready.

features.name: Interstages (decouplers, separators, payload adapters)
features.comment: First commits including fairings and interstages.

features.name: Fairings
features.comment: First commits including fairings and interstages.

features.name: Cargo bays, service modules, payload mounts
features.comment: Some work in progres the by KSA team

features.name: Radial attachments
features.comment: Some work in progres the by KSA team

features.name: Exotic engines (ion, nuclear, ramjet, scramjet, etc.)
Robotic parts: hinges, rotors, pistons, etc.
Lights
features.comment: Some work in progres the by KSA team

features.name: Navball
features.comment: Shader-based, monochrome navball with multiple modes. Some modders working on custom navballs [(ap0r) Colorful Navball](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/colorful-navball-sky-is-pale-blue-ground-is-pale-brown-v1-0.313/)

features.name: SAS (Stability assists and automatic attitude)
features.comment: Functional, including a detailed UI panel.

features.name: Multiple propellant types
features.comment: Some work in progres the by KSA team.

features.name: Data-links between vessels (Comms network)
features.comment: Some modders working on something related [(General Meatsauce) RF Spectrum Mod](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/rf-spectrum-mod.570/)

features.name: Radio Detection and Ranging (RADAR)
features.comment: Some modders working on something related [(General Meatsauce) RF Spectrum Mod](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/rf-spectrum-mod.570/)

features.name: Radio(Astronomy, Beacons, Collision detection, Signals intelligence)
features.comment: Some modders working on something related [(General Meatsauce) RF Spectrum Mod](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/rf-spectrum-mod.570/)

features.name: Celestial bodies scanning, surveying and mapping
Asteroid and comets discovery and tracking
EVA science, crew science and surface samples.
Realistic solar system (RSS like)
features.comment: A real solar system is used during development. Briar Thrain & tomservo are working on a tool that           collects real astronomical data (NASA Horizons) and converts it to KSA format [(Briar Thrain & tomservo) PEBKAC](https://meow.science.fail/pebkac/)

features.name: High-res terrain and planets
features.comment: A lot of planets have crisp textures

features.name: Reentry effects
features.comment: Sound is there during reentry. No plasma visuals yet.

features.name: First person EVA
features.comment: Regular EVA is possible. No first person.

features.name: Dynamic and immersive music
features.comment: Some cool music is already there. Some modders working on this. [(sillytrongooboo) KSP2 Music Replace](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/ksp2-music-replace.405/) [(Thoteus) GustavHolst](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/gustav-holsts-the-planets-orchestral-suite-soundtrack.386/)

features.name: Custom HUD
features.comment: Some modders are working on this. [(Uriah) AircraftHUD](https://drive.google.com/file/d/12ijGp8R32uOEJYat2-mLpvnqLkMQo7YB/view?usp=drive_link)

features.name: Custom Gatonauts
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(Thoteus) CustomCatastronauts](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/custom-catastronaut-skins.543/) [(dandoesstuff) Kitten Ears!](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/kitten-ears.140/#post-2664)

features.name: Discord integrations
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(rat in suit) KSADiscordRichPresence](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/discord-rich-presence.549/)

features.name: Reasonably good memes
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(dandoesstuff) Everything is Scott Munley](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/everything-is-scott-munley.430/)

features.name: Icons, favicons, desktop icons
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(averageksp) Multiple icons for your KSA shortcut on your desktop (.ico)](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/multiple-icons-for-your-ksa-shortcut-on-your-desktop-ico.464/#post-2145) [(henr1k) KSA Icon and flat Logo [CC 4.0]](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/ksa-icon-and-flat-logo-cc-4-0.496/) [(Planetary) My KSA Icon/Logo](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/my-ksa-icon-logo.525/) [(Infinite_Spaces.) Temporary Icon (.ico) files for KSA.](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/temporary-icon-ico-files-for-ksa.269/)

features.name: dear imGui implot extension support
features.comment: KSA team working on library integration. [(KSA) dear imGui implot extension](https://github.com/epezent/implot)

features.name: Controller support
features.comment: Forums and Discord have some info about controller profiles and bindings

features.name: Part catalog (search, tags, categories, etc...)
features.comment: Some work in progres the by KSA team

features.name: Mod management (CKAN)
features.comment: Some modders are working on this. [(Awsomgamr999) KSAMM](https://spacedock.info/mod/4048/KSA%20Mod%20Manager%20(KSAMM) )

features.name: In-game bug reporting with logs and screenshots
Customizable toolbars
features.comment: Directly via imgui. Some modders working on this. [(MrJeranimo) ModMenu](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/modmenu.562/)

features.name: Languages
features.comment: Some people are getting organized in the forums about this.

features.name: External Data Stream (RPC, Protobuf, etc...Telemachus like)
features.comment: Some modders are working on this. No links yet

features.name: Celestials visited tracking
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(MrJeranimo) Celestial Charter](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/celestial-charter-a-completionists-dream.500/#post-2503)

features.name: Ship teleportation debug option
features.comment: Game core allows you teleport the ship for testing to multiple locations.Some modders working on this. [(UriahGnu) Launch Vehicle One (LV-1)](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/launch-vehicle-one-lv-1-wip.438/)

features.name: Multiple star systems
features.comment: Custom star systems are possible via configuration files. Some modders working on this. [(Thoteus) CustomMoonarSystem](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/alternate-reality-moonar-system-13-additional-moons-mynimas-saphina-kin-verbul-icar-strobok-insulus-rie-aphere-hex-resin-and-more.377/) [(Elowiny) JublioSystemKSA](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/the-jublio-system-1-0-1.427/) [(UriahGnu) Planet Only Systems (for poor people)](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/planet-only-systems-for-poor-people.550/) [(Plazma) KSP-Redux](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/ksp-redux.338/)

features.name: Dwarf planets, minor bodies and irregular moons
Procedural planets
features.comment: Some modders working on something similar in concept. [(Awsomgamr999) PolarEarth](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/polar-earth.204/#post-1019) [(Emu) RedDwarfSol](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/red-dwarf-sol.230/#post-1091)

features.name: Simple API to create new planets
features.comment: A clear interface is present to create new planets.

features.name: Cooperative / competitive multiplayer
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(RacerXx) KSA Multiplayer](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/ksa-multiplayer.637/)

features.name: Steam integration
features.comment: Some modders working on this. [(sillytrongooboo) KSA Steam Page](https://forums.ahwoo.com/threads/ksa-steam-page.378/)
